name: Haunted Mariya's Hotel Hidden Objects.
description:
>- Universal app!!enjoy it in iphone and ipad.

=>Explore the Haunted Mariya's Hotel and experience supernatural phenomenon for yourself in Haunted Hotel: The Lonely Dream! Find Hidden Objects as you explore the different rooms of the hotel and discover spooky secrets. Collect helpful Inventory objects to help you progress through the building, and solve tricky puzzles. Each room brings you closer to the truth in Mariys's Hotel,Help to Mariya's Hotel

=> Game center leader boards to compare with friends & family!
=> Every level completed you got a coin! so play fair and fast to get 5 stars!
=> Hint option available for your help,but use it carefully it deducts your start.
=> Master your detective skills!
=> Find the dark secrets behind a Mariya's hotel!
If you can share this app on facebook and Twitter then you will get some coin.
